title: Foxworth Friday: 'New Media' vs. 'Old Media', Freddie Freeman Missing Atlanta?
description:
Bomani Jones and Domonique Foxworth share their thoughts on Freddie Freeman firing his agent over a reported miscommunication that led to him signing with the Dodgers over the Braves this past winter (1:13), and riff on how it relates to the NBA free agent market to be this summer (12:06). Plus, the “new” media versus the “old” media, as defined by Warriors F Draymond Green and how Twitter aggregating fans the flames of it all (20:19).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
